home_description: This is my go-to starter for building SEO-friendly, blazing-fast, and fully internationalized websites. Packed with AstroJS, Tailwind, Motion, React + TS, Paraglide, and Lucide Icons — everything’s set up so you can skip the hassle and dive right in.
only_in_english: This part is only in EN and fallbacks to EN in other languages.
